name: Fan Studio
description:
Fan Studio is a certified mobile app and game development company and a verified member of the UK Association for Interactive Entertainment UKIE.org.uk and TIGA.org (the Trade Association representing the UK's game industry) and was founded in 2008.
We specialize in games & app development and gamification strategies for startups and enterprise clients.
Our game developers are here to help you find the best solutions, research, launch your app and give you advice whenever you need it. 
 
READ MORE...

locations.address: 4 Carol I Bvd, Habitat A, 3rd floor
